content: sts 93 row 56 k8 m1 k11 7 times m1 k8 101 even row 58-76 k all sts 101 odd row 57-75 k if working in-the- round p if working flat lengthen here if desired but stop about 1/2 short of desired length 18 additional row/rounds recommended for slimmer dolls but stop 3/8 short of desired length flat version k 5 row garter st and bobble in k in-the-round version starting with a p round alternate k and p until 5 rounds have been worked ending with a p round bobble in k for sleeves in-the-round version place sleeve sts on dpns or circular needles two circs or magic loop round 1 pick up and k 3 sts at under arm k to end pu and k 2 sts 34 sts round 2 p2tog twice p to last two sts p2tog round 3 k all sts round 4 p all sts round 5 bobble in k repeat with other sleeve sew back seam and underarm seams if knit flat sew buttons on button band block abbreviations m1 an increase st lift the bar below last st on needle and the next st place it on the needle with the right side in front knit through back loop yo yarn over also called yarn forward bring yarn to front and over needle work next st it will make a hole for this pattern it is used for making button holes and follows k2tog so no st increase co cast on unless specified use long-tailed co for flat version knitted co is used with yarn in back insert needle between first two sts on needle bring yarn through and place on needle in front of first st bobble bind off cast off pm place marker sm slip marker kfb knit in front and back of same stitch this pattern is protected by copyright any items made from it may be sold copyright © 2016 and copyright © 2019 by peggy stuart
